act.title: Dialog Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.pinyin: Wǒ è le, wǒ xiǎng mǎi gè miànbāo.

item.hanzi: 你喜欢什么口味的面包？
item.pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuān shénme kǒuwèi de miànbāo?

item.hanzi: 我喜欢巧克力面包。你要吃点什么
item.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān qiǎokèlì miànbāo. Nǐ yào chī diǎn shénme?
